intro_para.intent: I am writing to apply for the MotorSports development engineer position at A123 Systems Inc. listed in NUCareers.
intro_para.reason: I am thrilled to see progress being made into the future of clean energy in the automotive industry. I am also most driven in a work environment that keeps me on my toes with both business development work and engineering based problem solving.
intro_para.proposition: I think my experience working for both well established engineering companies and fast paced start ups that are still establishing themselves gives me a unique set of skills that are useful in process development.

para_background.experience: At my first co-op at Amphenol PCD, I was introduced to the types of standards that needed to be met to serve customers in the military and aerospace industries. I produced and followed standard operating procedures created by companies like Raytheon and Boeing in the process of developing and supplying quality electrical products for their assemblies. The rigorous standards implemented at this job taught me the importance of well organized and effective documentation of everything involved in an engineering company. It also taught me how necessary it was to work creatively within the bounds of these SOPs in order to pruduce quality end products. This job is also where I became accomplished using 3D modeling and rapid prototyping programs such as Pro-E/Creo and 3D printing.

In my experience working at Infinium, Inc., a material science start up, I learned all about process development in a research environment. At this company I worked on a small team to refine a process to create primary aluminum via electrochemical processes. I modelled in AutoCAD inventor and helped to build infrastructure for the developing process. I also performed material compatability tests and post experiment analysis using x-ray diffraction, scanning electron microscopy, and data analysis in MatLab.

Aside from my work experience, I am a recent student at a University that emphasizes professional development and entrepreneurship. In my labs and classes, I have developed strong technical writing and communication skills, the ability to work effectively with teams of people, and resourceful problem solving skills.

para_closing.compatability: I believe I work best in a fast paced, energetic environment and think I would be able to integrate well into a team like A123 Systems' MotorSports.
para_closing.next_step: I would welcome the opportunity to futher discuss the position and my qualifications in the near future. Thank you very much for your consideration!
